text: Term may mean: * Technical term, part of the specialized vocabulary of a particular field * Term of office, the length of time a person serves in a particular office * Term of patent, the maximum period during which a patent can be maintained in force * Term of a pregnancy * Prison sentence, or term, a time served in a prison * Term of a contract * School or college term - usually 3 periods of study in a year. * Term (mathematics)
title: Term
